principalInfo.title: Who I am?
principalInfo.description: I am a Full Stack Junior Web Developer with basic knowledge in OOP, BDO, PHP, Python, JavaScript and I am currently learning ReactJs, as well as other technologies to always stay at the forefront with the most demanded languages. I characterize myself as being responsible and autonomous, self-taught and leader, I like to learn from different areas and look for the best solutions to the problem posed.

testimonials.cardYeison: I know your work and I know that you handle clean and indexed code, have a good problem solving perspective and incredible logic, in addition to using good practices.
testimonials.cardCristian: He is an autonomous and proactive person, he solves problems and improves the effectiveness of processes to increase the quality of a composite system.
testimonials.cardFernando: He is a responsible and autonomous person, apt to face the highest challenges and find the best solution, he is also willing to learn and be taught.
